text: well in these holidays i got a ton of homework and i am completing them also the advise that you gave me, has given me a clearer path to my goal thanks a lot

Very happy to hear I helped :sunglasses: 

In terms of your next steps, what do yu have planned? Are you going to be looking for work experience and doing a CV/personal statement etc? I'm happy to help and take a look at your drafts for you now? 

Do you also have an idea of what skills you need to be building to be attractive for a PhD and employers in computer science? I can help you figure this out too if you are unsure. One of the big regrets  we hear from a lot of our mentors and professionals whatever career they go into, is that they focused solely on their grades and didn't start developing attractive / useful skills whilst they were at school.
